name: PRE_AR_CHG_BND_EPSD
description: A table for the episode column for temporary accounts receivable (TAR). A record/charge line/episode line combination here corresponds to the same record/charge line/episode line combination in the other four bundled episode tables for TAR.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge session record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: BND_EPSD_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: A bundled episode linked to the charge line
